text: Need Joshua Hall for Supercheap Auto campaign. Budget around $29,142, looking for 3 x Press release quote, 3 x LinkedIn post, 3 x Instagram post, 2 x Product launch event, 2 x 30-second Instagram reel. 5 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 8 months. Engagement period: 3 months.
